releaseNotes:
Enjoy a full schedule, real-time medal updates, and live action like never before!

In this new app, we have reinvented the user experience to bring you closer to the Games than ever before. In the new app you can find: 

- A brand-new homepage. Designed to highlight everything about the Paris 2024 Paralympic Games.
- My Events. Manage your ticketed sessions and enhance your spectator experience.
- The competition schedule to help you prepare for your Games.
- Relive the Olympic Games with full highlights and event recaps. 
- The Games Map shows you all the events related to the Games near you. Celebration, cultural events, national team houses, and fan zones – you will always know where you need to be.

We hope you enjoy this new version. Please share your feedback on: https://support.olympics.com
description:
Welcome to the Paris 2024 Paralympics app, your personal companion for the Games

Olympics: 26 July – 11 August 2024
Paralympics: 28 August – 8 September 2024

Get up-to-the-second medal results, a full schedule, a wide range of spectator experiences, including the Games Map and ticket-holder insights, breaking news on all your favourite athletes, and live updates with behind-the-scenes access. The Paris 2024 Paralympics app is your go-to resource for the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

Here are the main features you will find in the official app:

• WATCH LIVE: Don't miss a moment of Paralympic glory. Stream all your favourite events and watch full highlights. 
• BREAKING NEWS: Get minute-by-minute updates on all your favourite events. Receive customised push notifications by adding all your favourite teams and athletes.
• CUSTOMISE YOUR EXPERIENCE: Add all your favourite 
•  RELIVE THE OLYMPICS: Re-watch all your favourite moments from the Olympic Games of Paris 2024.

PARALMYPIC SCHEDULE

Never miss a moment! Follow your favourite Paralympic sports, teams and athletes.

REAL-TIME MEDAL COUNT

Follow the Games even more closely with the medal table. Track your favourites so you're always up to date.

GAMES MAP

Want to experience the Games outside the competition venues? The Games Map shows you all the events near you. Celebrations, cultural events, national team houses and fan zones – you will always know where you need to be. Check back often to unlock the ultimate Games experience.

MY EVENTS

Sign in with the same email you used to connect to Paris 2024 Tickets for a seamless spectator experience. Unlock the My Events feature to gain access to a dedicated section for all your ticketed sessions. Manage everything in one place, view key information, explore features, and plan your schedule for each event, ensuring a smooth and unforgettable Paris 2024 experience. For entry into the venues, download the Paris 2024 Tickets app to access your digital tickets.

OLYMPIC SHOP

Get access to the Olympic Shop, the one-stop destination for all your Paralympic and Paris 2024 merchandise. From T-shirts and hoodies, to pins and mascot plush toys, you will find everything you need to get closer to the Games.

The app content is available in English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Hindi, Korean, Russian, German, Portuguese and Spanish. Please refer to our terms and condition and privacy policy for additional terms.
